alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; James City; Mathews; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued August 30 at 9:43PM EDT until August 31 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 8 PM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Gloucester, Mathews, James City and York Counties. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 8 PM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Shallow flooding is expected in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline resulting in a low threat of property damage. Expect up to one foot of water above ground level in low lying, vulnerable areas. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks and lawns near the waterfront will experience shallow flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. WARE RIVER AT SCHLEY VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.8 FT, MAJOR 3.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/10 PM 4.1 1.4 1.3 1 NONE 31/10 AM 4.4 1.7 1.8 1 NONE 31/10 PM 4.7 2.0 2.0 1 MINOR 01/11 AM 4.3 1.6 1.5 1 NONE 01/11 PM 3.9 1.2 1.3 1 NONE 02/12 PM 3.9 1.2 1.1 1 NONE YORKTOWN VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 5.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.9 FT, MODERATE 2.4 FT, MAJOR 2.9 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/10 PM 4.0 1.4 0.8 1 NONE 31/10 AM 4.6 2.0 1.6 2 MINOR 31/10 PM 4.9 2.3 1.7 2 MINOR 01/11 AM 4.6 2.0 1.5 1 MINOR 01/11 PM 4.4 1.8 1.3 1 NONE 02/12 PM 4.3 1.7 1.1 1 NONE WINDMILL POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.0 FT, MODERATE 3.5 FT, MAJOR 4.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.6 FT, MODERATE 2.1 FT, MAJOR 2.6 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/11 PM 2.6 1.2 0.7 1 NONE 31/12 PM 2.9 1.5 1.1 1 NONE 01/12 AM 3.0 1.6 1.2 1 MINOR 01/12 PM 3.0 1.6 1.2 1 MINOR 02/01 AM 2.9 1.5 1.1 1 NONE 02/01 PM 2.9 1.5 1.0 1 NONE JAMES RIVER AT SCOTLAND/JAMESTOWN VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 4.5 FT, MAJOR 5.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 31/12 AM 3.6 1.4 1.0 1 NONE 31/01 PM 4.0 1.8 1.6 1 MINOR 01/01 AM 4.5 2.3 2.0 1 MODERATE 01/02 PM 4.3 2.1 1.8 1 MINOR 02/02 AM 3.9 1.7 1.5 1 NONE 02/03 PM 3.8 1.6 1.2 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
